#summary Documentation to sympy.

= Introduction =

This is the central page for all documentation to !SymPy.

= Main documentation =

If you are new to SymPy, start looking at the examples: [http://code.google.com/p/sympy/wiki/Examples Examples].

Then read the driving ideas behind !SymPy that are described in HowItWorks.

And finally, read the sources itself or the API documentation:
http://sympy.googlecode.com/svn/api/index.html

= Other =

Description of !SymPy printing system is in [http://code.google.com/p/sympy/wiki/PrintingMathML PrintingMathML].

For some ideas, where Sympy can be used, see http://code.google.com/p/sympy/wiki/Motivation.
